subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My first Ghost Box Reply Recorded & Needed Audobe Audition Help
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1467849987-1200447218=:11839
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Gab:
            I use Adobe as well.  Just try the scientific filter, then clip and pop reduction and amplify using 3 to 6 boost.  Don't do too much more otherwise it will hurt your audio clip.  In addition, always save the original.
   
            If you want to go through a clip together a few times, please feel free to email me under separate cover and I will be more than happy to assist you.
   
            Looking forward to hearing your research!
   
  Juli

eastern_paranormal <eparanormal@...> wrote:
          I uploaded my first Ghost Box recording to my EVP file today. I used 
the same process cleaning it up with Audobe Audition I use with my 
EVP's but it seems to need more. Does anyone have Audobe Audition 
advice for cleaning up that radio static?

Gab
